title: "Exploring Voice Recognition in Toys With SoapBox Labs’ Jamie Beaumont on the Power Kid Podcast"
excerpt: "In this week’s episode of the “Power Kid Podcast,” host Phil Albritton of Power Kid Design welcomes Jamie Beaumont, chief operating officer at SoapBox Labs. SoapBox Labs is focused on the growing technology of voice recognition and how it can best be used for kids in a variety of sectors."
